cursed_craft.config.title: Cursed Craft
cursed_craft.config.option.pistonInfinit: Makes pistons literally push infinite blocks, technically. Its more +2,147,483,647 because that's the highest number for a 32bit signed integer.
cursed_craft.config.option.rapidSkeleton: If enabled skeletons will rapid fire.
Causes the game to crash once you die.
cursed_craft.config.label.skeletonDisabl: The skeleton rapid-fire feature is disabled because you’re on ${minecraft}. You need to be on 1.21.1 or higher to use it.
cursed_craft.config.option.oneTapZombies: Makes all zombies deal ~10,000 damage to everything, be careful!
cursed_craft.config.label.serverConfigDi: Since you are playing on a server none of these configs will be applied, the server manages all of this.
cursed_craft.config.label.notInServer: Since you are not on a Multiplayer server you can change these and it will effect singleplayer gameplay!
